answers.answer: Hi,How are you? I'm sorry to hear about your mother. Surgery is used to treat all stages of ovarian cancer while chemotherapy is used after surgery to treat any remaining disease. However, the prognosis depends on several factors such as the stage of the cancer, patient's general health and presence of co-morbid conditions such as diabetes, hypertension or heart disease. Take care and regards.

question: It says here that there is a cure for ovarian cancer yet back in 2004 when my mother was diagnosed with ovarian cancer later that year on October 24 she was pronounced dead due to ovarian cancer.. Why didn't this "cure" so to speak help her?
title: very curious
